{{{class="brush:c++"
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------
//function		:   exponent
//description	:   generate exponentially distributed random numbers
//input			:   beta: mean of exponentially distributed
//return		:    
//others		:    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------
double exponent(float beta, long int *seed)
{
    double u, x ;
    u = uniform(0.0, 1.0, seed) ;
    x = -beta * log(u) ;
    return x ;
}
}}}
